alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 12:38PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Millard County through 115 PM MDT... At 1238 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Meadow, or near Fillmore, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fillmore, Meadow, Holden, Flowell and Greenwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 157 and 184. US Route 50 between mile markers 110 and 119, and between mile markers 137 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A severe thunderstorm watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for central Utah.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Eastern Juab, Millard Counties
